mapper.sql: id, login_name, login_pwd, email, tel, person_id, status, is_delete, create_time, update_time
mapper.delete: update bd_user set is_delete = 1 where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.insert: insert into bd_user (id, login_name, login_pwd, email, tel, person_id, status, is_delete, create_time, update_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{loginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{loginPwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{personId,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isDelete,jdbcType=BIT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

update bd_user
login_name = #{loginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
login_pwd = #{loginPwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
tel = #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
person_id = #{personId,jdbcType=CHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
is_delete = #{isDelete,jdbcType=BIT},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
